sense.gloss: to die down (storm, anger, conflict, etc.), to calm down, to cool off, to abate, to be settled, to be brought under control
to be at peace, to be governed well
to subside (of pain, symptoms, etc.), to be alleviated, to get better, to ease off

sdata.j: ↑腫↑↓は↓れが|↑治↑↓おさ↓まる|まで、どれぐらいかかりそうですか？
sdata.e: How many days will it take until the swelling goes down?
